name: Firefox Appbutton for fxOpera
description:
This style is designed to blend the appbutton (Firefox's orange menu button) into the fxOpera theme.

6/21/13 - I forgot to mention that it won't look right unless you use the Tabs Always in Titlebar extension. https://addons.mozilla.org/en-us/firefox/addon/tabs-always-in-titlebar/

6/24 - After installation, if your window is maximized it, unmaximize the window and maximize again to see the design properly. This style modifies some of the margins and Firefox has to adjust.

7/10 - Uploaded the wrong v2.0 code by mistake. All fixed now.
additional_info:
V2.0 - Several glitches resolved. The code has been refreshed and simplified. 
v1.0 - Tested using Firefox 21 and fxOpera skin/theme on Windows 7 (with the Soft7 visual style).

Known glitch: Sometimes the margins appear off depending on what addons/extensions you have installed. I'm using no other addons which change the way my browser displays the UI other than fxOpera. Feel free to tweak the CSS code as needed to achieve the correct effect OR uninstall UI-altering addons.
